m_szDocSumamry: 2014 Porsche Cayenne Plug-In Hybrid Electric Vehicle In The Works November 28th, 2012 by Zachary Shahan     This article has been reposted from EV Obsession with full permission (with minor modifications). When I see Porsche or Ferrari electric vehicles , for some reason, I think, “Wow, that is awesome!” (Oh yeah, that’s because they are awesome.) Porsche Cayenne S Hybrid Electric Vehicle Not only are they awesome because these vehicles are beauties of human workmanship and care, but also because such cars will inspire more people to love electric vehicles . It opens people’s minds to the fact
